channel.title: Run.bat loading JDK7
channel.description:
[i][b]For my Client, my run.bat is running with JDK7[/b][/i] And everyone can't load my client for some reason, and i know its the java I got them to download the new JDK7 cuz thats what it is running but it only works for certain people I would like to change it to the jdk6 as most people dont have 7 [u][i][b]This is what is in my run.bat below.[/b][/i][/u]
@echo off Title LeanPkz V1 cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
[i]I tried changing the "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" to "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_29\bin\java.exe" And it gives me the "Cannot find the path specified" error PLEASE HELP![/i] Thanks for your time [size=12pt][u][b]Also; IF SOMEONE COULD HELP ME CREATE MY WEBCLIENT I'D BE GRATEFUL. :)[/b][/u][/size]

item.title: Run.bat loading JDK7
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

try
@echo off
Title LeanPkz V1
cd ./
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.7.0_04\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

if you have a different update like 7u3 or whatever change the 04 to 03, and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat loading JDK7
item.dc:creator: @forever-rune forever-rune
item.description:
@forever-rune wrote:

[quote=“Its ema, post:6, topic:442211”]Try this:

@echo off Title LeanPkz V1 cd ./ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit [/quote]
It didnt even give it a chance to load, immediatley closed CMD prompt

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat loading JDK7
item.dc:creator: @forever-rune forever-rune
item.description:
@forever-rune wrote:

For my Client, my run.bat is running with JDK7
And everyone can’t load my client for some reason, and i know its the java
I got them to download the new JDK7 cuz thats what it is running but it only works for certain people
I would like to change it to the jdk6 as most people dont have 7
This is what is in my run.bat below.

@echo off Title LeanPkz V1 cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

I tried changing the “C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” to “C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_29\bin\java.exe”
And it gives me the “Cannot find the path specified” error
PLEASE HELP!

Thanks for your time
[size=12pt]Also; IF SOMEONE COULD HELP ME CREATE MY WEBCLIENT I’D BE GRATEFUL. [/size]

Read full topic
